Detailed Description

This is an especially important RK-plugin-widget. It provides a list of variables (derived from the document's table), that can be selected for statistical analysis. It's major counterpart is the RKVarSlot-class, which "takes" variables selected from this list. Most of the time, you'll only have a single VarSelector in a GUI, but you can have more than one, e.g. for serving conceptionally different VarSlots.

Author:
Thomas Friedrichsmeier
